title: RBI imposes penalty on Yes Bank and ICICI Bank
description: The penalty is imposed on Yes Bank because it levied charges on customers for non-maintenance minimum balance in certain savings accounts with insufficient or zero balance, which is in violation of RBI's guidelines, while ICICI Bank sanctioned term loan/ loans to certain entities in lieu of or to substitute budgetary resources envisaged for certain projects.
